Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Mycobacterium phage peptide (33-47)[K2V; K3,4,15A; S6L; L10S; G12W; A13W; V14A], AK15-6 (K-A)

Literature.Title: A small mycobacteriophage-derived peptide and its improved isomer restrict mycobacterial infection via dual mycobactericidal-immunoregulatory activities.
Literature.Author: Yang Y, Liu Z, He X, Yang J, Wu J, Yang H, Li M, Qian Q, Lai R, Xu W, Wei L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=75µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis WXY(MIC=75µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis CAS3(MIC=75µg/ml)
